description:
Pavel is half Bosnian and half American. He's travelled around Europe and the States but had never been to the Pacific coast.
"This is your first time in the Pacific? California?"
"First time!" He smiled.
"What do you think?"
"Not bad at all. The ocean is great. The weather is great and the people are really laid back."
He really loved it here. He was all about spending his day at the beach and in the ocean even though he didn't like the salt water very much!
He keeps busy with work in the morning and school at night...and, of course, hitting the gym. He's got a nice lean, muscled, swimmer's build with hairy pecs. He's also got great hairy legs, a furry butt and cock...just the perfect amount of hair everywhere!
title: Pavel
